alert.note: Alert for Alexander (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 11:41AM EST until January 11 at 5:58AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of piedmont North Carolina, including the following counties, Alexander, Catawba and Iredell. * WHEN...Until 600 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...River and Lake levels remain elevated due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1135 AM EST, High lake levels at Lookout Shoals are expected to gradually lower as the afternoon wears on. Inundation of low-lying areas along the lake will slowly improve. Please continue to follow guidance from Catawba County Emergency Management. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
